description.narrative: The expected long term outcome are as follows: Trade Facilitation • Increased efficiency in the border procedures. • Effective implementation of the ISRT convention. • Increased in intra-regional trade Addressing the institutional constraints for an effective implementation of the ECOWAS commitments • Establishment of a permanent mechanism for intra and inter-ministerial coordination and consultation on trade policy making and implementation of the commitments • Establishment of a trade negotiation committee. Industrial policy for a sustainable economic development • Effective exploitation of comparative advantages. • Enhanced competitiveness and export capacities of selected high-potential industries. • Improved the economic environment in the long run thought the creation of MSMEs in competitive industries.

provider-org.narrative: UNOPS helps the UN and its partners run peacebuilding, humanitarian and development operations for people in need.
